directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In a large bowl, gently toss the cooked pasta, tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, and basil. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips
title: Easy Olive Oil, Tomato, and Basil Pasta
